description: Uphill from Acadia University lies a trail called the woodland trail.  As the name implies it's in the woods.  There are some benches along the way and a couple of picnic tables.  It can be muddy in some spots and there are a lot of different spur trails.
directions: Off highway 1 turn o nUniversity ave and pull off in a small parking lot where you will see a small sign post for the woodland trail.
title: Woodland Trail
